thread.title: юрий кабанов
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 юрий кабанов

author: юрий кабанов
title: юрий кабанов
text: Hello! A bit out neponyatochka orders and points. After contact support I responded quickly and to the point, no questions asked. I express my gratitude to the people with whom I spoke. I think that with such support will continue to deal with Banggood. I wish you all the best and prosperity in your business. Jury
